title: An AI version of you could live forever
description: New developments in artificial intelligence are allowing people to live forever, via versions of themselves that can converse with the living through companies such as You, Only Virtual and StoryFile.
content:
Living forever was once the stuff of sci-fi fantasy and Oasis song lyrics. No more. A digital recreation of you with no expiration date can be created for those who possess the money and desire.

title: The critical groundwork needed to win the AI race
description: Artificial intelligence has become a high-stakes global race that everyone is watching closely. But far from merely leading the race, Saudi Arabia has set out to help design the racetrack.
